401: Unauthorised. Please try logging in again.
404: The page you tried to reach doesn't exist.
api_down: The API is unavailable. Wait 30 seconds and try refreshing this page. If the page still does not load, restart your device.
author: Author
change_hostname_warning: Are you sure you want to change the URL and Wi-Fi SSID?
change_path_warning: You are about to change the start page of your device. To regain access to the Settings page after this change, visit:
click_swipe_instruction: Click and drag to turn the page.
click_toggle: Click an item below to open the administration. Use the toggles on the right to show or hide the components on the front page.
confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete the item(s)?
connection_reset_request: Your Learner's Block will now try to connect to your chosen Wi-Fi network. If your device is not available on the chosen network after a minute reconnect to your Learner's Block, check your Wi-Fi password and try again.
disconnect_wifi: Are you sure you want to disconnect from the Wi-Fi?
enable_components_in: You can enable components in the Control Panel.
files_settings_description: Manage files on your Block. Only logged in users can delete them.
hostname_changed_notification: Your URL and Wi-Fi SSID has been updated. Please restart the Block for this to take effect.
internet_no_wifi: Are you connected to Ethernet? To connect your Learner's Block to a Wi-Fi hotspot, you must connect to it via Wi-Fi first.
invalid_filemanager_string: You entered an invalid name. The following characters are not compatible: '/', '\0'
invalid_hostname: You have submitted an invalid URL and Wi-Fi SSID. Please try again.
invalid_input: Maximum of 32 characters; lowercase; no spaces and no special characters other than '_' and '-'
invalid_path_input: Your path must not start or end with a '/' and cannot contain spaces.
invalid_upload_string: entries contain an invalid name and will not be uploaded. The following characters are not compatible: '/', '\0'
invalid_wifi_entry: Wi-Fi passwords must be 8 characters or more and contain no spaces.
library_settings_description: Download content from the Learner's Block Library.
login_again: You have been logged out. Please try logging in again.
makerspace_settings_description: Download content from your Makerspace account.
need_connection: You need to connect to Wi-Fi or Ethernet to use these features. If you are connected, try refreshing the page.
network_absent: If you cannot see your network, reboot the device and try again.
network_connect_fail: Failed to connect to the network.
network_fetch_fail: Failed to fetch available networks. Restart your device and try again.
no_apps_to_display: There are no applications to display. Try refreshing your application database with the icon above.
no_networks: No Wi-Fi networks within range. Move closer and then click the refresh button.
overwrite_warning: This will overwrite the existing files. Do you want to continue?
path_changed_to: Your start page has been changed to
portainer_unavailable: Portainer is not available for your device.
prune_system_files_description: Prune unused system files to free up space on your device.
start_page_desc: Choose which page you want users to see when they first access your device.
swipe_instruction: Swipe left or right to turn the page.
swipe_up_for_menu: Swipe up to get the menu back.
this_may_take_time: This may take some time depending on your connection speed.
upload_files_exist: Some of the files you added already exist. These files will be overwritten.
visit_to_begin: Enter the following URL in your browser to start using your Learner’s Block:
website_settings_description: Upload your website files to allow others to use your site offline.
name: Name
connect_wifi_desc: Connect your Block to a nearby Wi-Fi network.
set_wifi_password_desc: Set a password for accessing your Block via Wi-Fi.
set_cp_password_desc: Set a password for logging in to this Control Panel.
app_installed: The application has been installed. It may take some time for the application to start and become available.
portainer_installing: Portainer is installing. This may take some time…
reset_database_description: Reset the database. This will erase many of your settings and stored passwords.
library_empty: Your Library is empty. You can add content through the Control Panel.
no_apps_installed: There are no applications installed on this device.
refresh_not_compatible: Your device is not able to refresh the networks. Restart your device to refresh the networks list instead.
no_space: Your Block is out of space.
not_logged_in: You are not logged in. Try logging back in to the settings panel and try again.
resource_not_available: This resource is not available for download.
display_only_direct_download: Display only items available for direct download.
library_api_down: Unable to reach the online Library. Check your internet connection and try again.
wifi_login_disabled: Your Wi-Fi password has been disabled. Restart your device to apply the changes.
wifi_password_set_success: Your Wi-Fi password has been set. Restart your device to apply the changes.
url_wifi_desc: Change the URL used to access your Block, and how your Block appears in people's list of Wi-Fi networks.
your_new_ssid: Your new Wi-Fi SSID will be:
portainer_desc: A GUI to manage custom Docker containers on your Block.
